amendment.description: Amendment increases funding to the National Veterans Business Development Corporation by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to set aside funds for National Veterans Business Development Corporation in the amount of $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (CA) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mrs. Davis (CA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davis (CA) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
